sentences.sContent: He said the city had shirked its responsibility by not overseeing construction.
sentences.sCn: 他说这座城市逃避了监管工程建筑的责任。

sentences.sContent: The government will not shirk from considering the need for further action.
sentences.sCn: 政府将不会回避考虑进一步行动的需要。

words.tran: 懒骨头；逃避责任者；开小差的人

trans.tranCn: 推卸或逃避； 开小差
trans.tranOther: If someone shirks their responsibility or duty, they do not do what they have a responsibility to do
